ing: 1 cup extra long grain rice (15 minute)
n: One Pot Easy Cheesy Vegetables and Rice
des: "This easy and cheesy one-pot dish gets to the table in under 15 minutes and is a great way to add more vegetables to your meal.  Bonus Â– only one pot to clean!"
ins:
Heat oil in medium sauce pan over medium-high heat.
Add remaining ingredients, except for cheese.
Bring to a boil for 1 minute.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed.
Add cheese and stir until melted and serve immediately.
